stories.text:
Background: I'm an older, self-taught developer who was a team parent for my kid's sports team. I wanted to embed our Teamsnap ICal calendar in our team's Squarespace website only to find out that its kind of a pain in the ass. Yes, you can use Google Calendar or to do it but the design looks about 15 years old.

So, a couple Fridays ago with a bottle of wine and some open source help from ICal.Net & FullCalendar.io, I got something working. Spent the last few weeks cleaning it up and adding in a subscription component. Hoping to break even on hosting.

I know this is a niche thing that I pretty much built to scratch my own itch. I anticipate tens (if not DOZENS!) of other potential users are out there...but, what the heck...you are supposed to "Just Ship It", right?? (https://kitze.io/posts/saddest-just-ship-it-story-ever) So here you go HN...let me know what you think but go easy on me ;-)
stories.title: Show HN: Embed Customized ICal Calendars on Your Website
